headlines.title: The Beach Boys’ Brian Wilson Dies at 82
headlines.description: The beloved musician had been living with a neurocognitive disorder akin to dementia

headlines.title: Pragmata, delayed for years, is now the year’s biggest surprise
headlines.description: Capcom’s sci-fi action game was announced in 2020 and set for 2022. Thought canceled, it turned up at Summer Game Fest 2025 and shocked everyone.

headlines.title: Fossils found in 1970s are most recent ancestor of tyrannosaurs, scientists say
headlines.description: Researchers identify new species named Khankhuuluu mongoliensis from skeletons unearthed in Mongolia

headlines.title: Deion Sanders says everything is OK as he deals with health issue
headlines.description: Colorado coach Deion Sanders is currently away from his team and recuperating in Texas from an unspecified medical issue, but he put out a statement today saying he is OK.

headlines.title: CPI Shows U.S. Inflation Remains Muted as Tariff Impact Is Limited
headlines.description: The Consumer Price Index rose 2.4 percent in May, from a year ago, a reading that reflects only the initial impact of President Trump’s tariffs.

headlines.title: Pop Culture Takes Up Smoking Again
headlines.description: From movies and TV shows to music, the habit is no longer taboo. It’s even being celebrated for the way it makes characters look cool or powerful.

headlines.title: DHS spokesperson defends Trump's use of the military in LA : NPR
headlines.description: Tricia McLaughlin, assistant secretary for public affairs at the Department of Homeland Security, explains why the Trump administration has deployed National Guard and Marine troops to Los Angeles amid protests against immigration raids.

headlines.title: Apple 'Sherlocked' These Apps at WWDC 2025
headlines.description: Apple at WWDC previewed a bunch of new features coming in its updated operating systems, but certain changes will have been met with dismay by...

headlines.title: First Ever Images of Sun’s South Pole Released by ESA Solar Orbiter
headlines.description: Visuals from the European Space Agency’s Solar Orbiter reveal chaotic solar magnetism in the solar polar region. Even better images are expected in the years ahead.

headlines.title: MLB players make it clear they don’t want to play for the A’s, but which managers, teams do they like?
headlines.description: We asked more than 100 players which opposing managers they would and wouldn’t want to play for and got their take on rival organizations.
